item.title: Unveiling the Making of COVID-19 WebGIS: A Journey in Digital Mapping and Visual Storytelling
item.description: In the fast-paced world of tech, the development of applications often reflects the urgency of the times. My stint as a Web Developer intern at PT Sketsa Negeri Mandiri thrust me into the heart of this narrative, where alongside a dynamic duo, I embarked on a mission to contribute to the fight against COVID-19 through digital innovation. The Genesis: Taking Over the Baton Embarking on this project in the midst of a global pandemic was akin to stepping into a whirlwind.
